publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5756 Cathy Peattie: Dick Gaughan—That the Parliament congratulates Dick Gaughan on his Lifetime Achievement Award presented at this year’s BBC Radio 2 Folk Awards; notes that this follows his recent induction into the Scottish Traditional Music Hall of Fame; believes that, as songwriter, performer and social commentator, Dick Gaughan exemplifies the best of Scottish culture, and hopes that these awards will lead to further success and recognition of his talents and also will help to promote and encourage support for the living tradition of Scotland’s folk music and arts.

S3M-5756 Cathy Peattie: Dick Gaughan—That the Parliament LANG="EN">congratulates Dick Gaughan on his Lifetime Achievement Award presented at this year’s BBC Radio 2 Folk Awards; notes that this follows his recent induction into the Scottish Traditional Music Hall of Fame; believes that, as songwriter, performer and social commentator, Dick Gaughan exemplifies the best of Scottish culture, and hopes that these awards will lead to further success and recognition of his talents and also will help to promote and encourage support for the living tradition of Scotland’s folk music and arts.

S3M-5756 Dick Gaughan (lodged on 11 February 2010) John Wilson*, Margaret Curran*, Alasdair Allan*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Marlyn Glen*, Stewart Maxwell*, Mary Mulligan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Butler*, Angela Constance*, Bill Kidd*, Michael McMahon*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Christopher Harvie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Rob Gibson*, Mary Scanlon*, Robin Harper*, Mr Frank McAveety*, George Foulkes*, Elaine Smith*, Rhona Brankin*
S3M-5756 Dick Gaughan (lodged on 11 February 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Michael Matheson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5756 Dick Gaughan (lodged on 11 February 2010) Jack McConnell*
S3M-5756 Dick Gaughan (lodged on 11 February 2010) Trish Godman*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-5756 Dick Gaughan (lodged on 11 February 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-5756 Dick Gaughan (lodged on 11 February 2010) Stuart McMillan*
